name: Nail It Deep!
description:
A simple game I made alone in about 4-5 hours for Ludum Dare 48. I had a different game for Compo but gave up on it because I started late and didn’t have enough time. So I came up with a much simpler idea to attempt for Jam, then worked on it till its completion.

Playable on a mobile touchscreen! Android version available!

Fixes:

  1. Control tweaks. https://github.com/oneseedfruit/nail-it-deep/commit/c3813c7253f8028b69a7d31c2e0b...
